pageContext.claim: “But, you know, this is just like all of the other stuff that you -- not you, but that the press was asking -- all of which turned out to be -- we actually gave CDC more money, not less money. They said we defunded. It turned out it was more money. Every one of those things that were said were 100 percent wrong, and this sounds like another one them.”
pageContext.analysis: The Trump administration did try to cut funding for the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, including for global health programs, but Congress overruled it and adding back the funds.
